name: Slum Ball VR Tournament
description: Slum Ball is a VR fitness training game. Just hit the ball and see where it will take you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 – 4590 equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 – 4590 equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4450 MB available space
